Address: 34, SGS Magnum Mall, Moledina Road, Camp Area, Pune
Name: "McDonald's"
Review Text:
>We were very hungry then we decided to visit mc Donald's. These mc Donald's is very good.
>Their ambience is very amazing.
> cleanliness is perfectly maintained by them.
>must visit the place is really nice.

Address: Shop 22, Balewadi High Street, Cummins India Office Complex, Baner, Pune
Name: "McDonald's"
Review Text: We all know in the McDonalds is famous for their fast food and different kind of coffee . my experience was nice I love the food over there especially the coffee which I Take Every Time I visit to any outlet of it. visit it when you are hungry and you need good food in pocket friendly way. over all I would like to give 4 stars because the service was little slow nothing else

Address: HPCL, KPIT Cummins, Near Krishna Petrol Pump, Phase 2 Road, Hinjawadi, Pune
Name: "McDonald's"
Review Text: I always like mcd for food bt this time when i went i was not that happy that i give more then 3 ratings coz the service was slow n tables were nt clean when we called a person he took like 10 mins to clean it .

Address: Premier Plaza, Old Mumbai Pune Highway, Chinchwad, Pune
Name: "McDonald's"
Review Text:
Macdonalds is always preffered when i want to have fast food.
This store is open till 2 AM so its good for midnight hunger. 
For Veg McVeggie is best and in non veg i love Mc Spicy chicken

Address: Rainbow Plaza, Near Shivar Garden, Pimple Saudagar, Pune
Name: "McDonald's"
Review Text:
This is right next to my place and hence I visit here often when in need of a coffee. The point to note with MC'D is that you need to know the right time to visit and things to order to have a good experience here. I would rate this place a 3/5 based on all food items. But considering I usually go here for their Breakfast Menu, I find it a bang for my bucks. 

- Visit them for Breakfast Menu [8AM-11AM]  and get a Burger/Pancake(Thursday) and a nice portion of Cappuccino for INR 99
- When going on regular timings have their Spicy Chicken Burger with fries and coke. 
Good Ambiance and Spacious. Service is ok.

Address: Survey 15/4, Near Santosh Nagar, Thergaon, Dange Chowk, Pune
Name: "McDonald's"
Review Text:
McDonald's is always my favorite when it comes to Burger i really loved mc-veggies thats my favorite, My second favourite is mc-spicy paneer.
Recently i have seen few addition in their menu & tried Mexican frenh fries it was not worth, in normal fries they put some salsa & cheese sauce, i would not recommend, as their normal french fries is far better & crunchy.

service is really fast & staff are very polite . It is very spacious having a huge sitting area.
loved the experience.

The Only problem we faced is parking 4 wheeler, if proper arrangement can be made it would be great.

Address: Ground Floor, Mariplex Mall, Kalyani Nagar, Pune
Name: "McDonald's"
Review Text:
Once a week i visit this outlet.
Ideally visiting since 2008. One of my favourite outlet in pune.
Lovely staff.
spacious Ambience.
Super clean always.
Nice discounts and offers available, and good thing is that the staff tells u abt the discount or the offer u can avail.
Love mcdonalds Kalyaninagar | Pune

Address: Near City Pride Multiplex,  692 A2A Saluja Chambers, Satara Road, Pune
Name: "McDonald's"
Review Text:
Sunday night at McDonald's. We ordered two meals containing burgers, fries and coke. The Burger was yummy as usual.

This branch of McDonald's is located at Pune Satara Road. I found this place bit congested. Service was not that appropriate. The place itself wasn't clean with many messy tables. I had to reach out to cleaner to get it cleaned. Also, there was a problem with electricity when I visited this place. It got off more than 15-20  times which was very annoying in the night. I doubt they even have air conditioners at this place.

So, I would not prefer this branch of McDonald's though the food was good.

Overall Rating: 3

Ambience: 2
Food: 3
Service: 2

Cheers.!

Address: Survey 127, Gopal House, Harshal Gardens, Karve Road, Kothrud, Pune
Name: "McDonald's"
Review Text:
Been here so so many times when I used to live around. This outlet is spacious and staff here used to be nice (haven't visited in recent times, so don't know current status).

Service here standard as any other McDonald's Outlet, takes the time it takes, though it's quick. 
My Favourite here is McVeggie and Fries with Peri-Peri Spice. Good Place to be at.

Address: Ground Floor, Shop 6, Mezzanine & Go Building-A, Survey 60, Next to WTC-II, Kharadi, Pune
Name: "McDonald's"
Review Text:
Less stars only because their ice cream machine broke down within 5 days of launch and have not fixed it yet. 
USP: You get a table service instead of self service.
Major turn on(not for the health conscious): You can refill you aerated drinks any number of times if you take a meal. They even give you a jar full if you have multiple meals. So go nuts.

Address: Ground Floor, Suyog Plaza, JM Road, Pune
Name: "McDonald's"
Review Text: Sometimes the location of the any outlet is matter so much because you dont have that much option to hangout. The JM road McD is one of them. Although there are other options are available but still this place is always crowded. In addition to that it's 2 floor place so there is ample of space for sit. So you will definitely get place to sit. Apart from this I don't have to say anything abt food. Because it's already been benchmarked. So if you have problem to sit anywhere McD is there on JM road.

Address: Seasons Mall, Magarpatta City, Magarpatta, Pune
Name: "McDonald's"
Review Text: Egg and cheese mc muffin meal and veg pizza mcmuffin were ideal for home delivery on Gandhi Jayanti for an 11AM brunch. Prepration and taste were really good and worth the money paid for. Lives upto yhe McD standards.

Address: GA 18-19, Sacred World Mall, Jagtap Chowk, Wanowrie, Pune
Name: "McDonald's"
Review Text:
Since the time Mc Donald’s have opened at this place I have been visiting it quiet often as it’s very close to my place. Recently they have changed their interiors band it looks very bright and spacious.

Combo meals are great with French fries and coke. I loved loved Chicken kebab burger, very crisp chicken patty. Mc Chicken and Chicken Wraps are great too. Yes how can I forget the coke float, it’s a must for me on my table!

Staff have been sweet and well mannered always.

Address: Survey 32/2, Gurukrupa Hall, Ambegaon Budruk, Near Dmart, Dhankawadi, Pune
Name: "McDonald's"
Review Text: Full menu never available. Marketing it as a drive thru takes away the feel of the place. Serving time is decent and food meets McDonald's standards.

Address: Loni Kalbhor, Pune-Solapur Road, Pune
Name: "Mcdonald's"
Review Text:
Mc Donalds

I took a parcel from this outlet on my recent visit to my native place. Ordered 3 mc aloo tikki burgers and one medium fries. The burger was nicely done as usual, the bun was soft and tikki was superb in taste. The fried were also nicely done and were not oily. 

The packing for burgers was properly done and had paper napkins and sauce sachets in it, however the fries were packed in the regular serving paper pouch which is served at all the outlets, it was kept as it is in the parcel bag because of which some fries came out of it. I think the packing for the fries should be done in a spill proof box.

Paid around 199 for the meal. Parcel was handed over in less than 10 mins. Staff was polite and friendly.

Address: 1st Floor, West Black, Food Court, Amanora Town Centre, Hadapsar, Pune
Name: "Mcdonald's"
Review Text: I wanted a coffee while shopping in Amanora and decided to try the McCafe here. I ordered a coffee milk shake with brownies. Simply yum!! Along with a medium sized potato wedges pack, it was perfect for rejuvenating myself and get on with some more shopping!

Address: 8 -14 Stellar Enclave, DP Road, Aundh, Pune
Name: "McDonald's"
Review Text:
1) Value for money - 6/10 (Some of the burgers at this place are good!)

2) Food & Drinks - 7/10 (Its like any common Indian McDonalds. The menu is pretty standard.)

3) Atmosphere - 8/10 (The place has some really nice seating area as it's a Cafe and really lives upto it with both indoor and outdoor seating area!)

4) Service - 7/10

5) Hygiene - 6/10

Overall rating - 6.8/10 (Craving for some quick bite in Aundh, its pretty good.)

Address: Unit 201, Kakade Center Port, CTS 2687B, Bhamburda, Shivaji Nagar, Pune
Name: "McDonald's"
Review Text: We ordered meal for 2,new potato veggies and mc egg ! As always food ws delicious except the e potato veggies which were ok !burger bun. Meal for 2 included mc veggie /chicken coke and icecream with choclate syrup as well! So we were satisfied enough .

Address: Pune Central, Near Garware College, Erandwane, Pune
Name: "McDonald's"
Review Text:
Maharaja Mac Is The Burger I Have Ordered And Nothing Is More To Tell About The MacDonald The Taste Is Good And Location Wise It Is Good Place To Eat Inn.
So Overall Good Experience To Eat And Sit Inn

Address: Chanakya Nagri, Sinhgad Road, Pune
Name: "McDonald's"
Review Text:
One of my most and frequently visited place of mylist.
My fixed menu of here mcspicy chicken large combo.
One of the most spacious mcd in pune.
Staff is humble and helpful.
They also suggest you to make your orders done.
Overall a nice experience every time.
🍟🌯🍗🥤

Address: Mega Mart, Survey 365, Dapodi, Pimple Gurav, Pune
Name: "McDonald's"
Review Text:
Air condition doesn't work! And even it wasn't working the last time i came here ! Maybe 4 months before!
Ordered mcflurry oreo which comes in Vanilla flavour!but they gave it in strawberry flavour!?,😾😾 Who can do such a thing when they are out of. Stock!
Never going to visit again! disappointed!
French fries were veey salty!
Ambience is good !
Big place!
They dont serve coffee in mug! But. In paper cup! And give. Only two sugar sachets!
Toilets are very dirty!

Address: Dorabjee Mall, Survey 25/5, NIBM Extension, Dorabjee Paradise, NIBM Road, Pune
Name: "McDonald's"
Review Text:
Good ambience 
Great service 
A very clean and tidy place 
Just love the McDonald’s fries 🍟 
The coke float is a match made in heaven 🤩
Their Mexican aloo tikki burger 🍔 is yum 😋 
Best place to enjoy a meal with friends and family 
Great for takeaways 
Overall good 👍🏻

Address: 42 / 43, 3rd Floor, Kumar Pacific Mall, Shankar Seth Road, Swargate, Pune
Name: "McDonald's"
Review Text: Its always a pleasure to have french fries from McDonald.. i love their ambience.. i personally dnt like ketchup but when combine to french fries it gives some out of boundary taste... Love Mcd

Address: G 7, Phoenix Market City, Nagar Road, Viman Nagar, Pune
Name: "McDonald's"
Review Text: One cannot go wrong with the food when you step in here. My all time favorite is the Mac Maharaja burger and the wraps as well. Loving the cheesy fries too.

Address: Plot 5/2 /6, Bhusari Colony, Near Kothrud Bus Depot, Paud Road, Kothrud, Pune
Name: "McDonald's"
Review Text: Whenever I feel hungry, I always prefer McD .From Mc aloo tikki to Mc flurry everything has my 💓 heart. So recently they came up with new drink "Cappuccino" and I must it's really good and refreshing and a perfect 1 am reason to go to mcD 😍 .

Address: Showroom 102 & 103, Bearing Survey 116, Mumbai Bangalore Highway, Warje, Pune
Name: "McDonald's"
Review Text:
This place is really crowded and the service is unbelievably slow..i have no idea why.
I ordered mc aloo tikki- the burger was tasty but the sauce was barely there, would have liked some more...and potato wedges (regular)- I had to wait extra 10 mins for these after I got the burger. The wedges were piping hot and the bigger one's were soft and soggy. There was almost no masala on them.
I also had asked for aloo chatpata naan..but it was not available in this outlet.
1 star removed for slow service.

Address: Unit SF 09, 2nd Floor, Dorabjee's Royal Heritage Mall, Mohammadwadi, Salunkhe Vihar Road, Pune
Name: "McDonald's"
Review Text: Ordered a mc spicy chicken burger. It was alright. The mayonnaise was not put generously in the burger. The price was reasonable. Good experience overall.

Address: 201, Kakade Center Port, Pune University Road, Pune University, Pune
Name: "McDonald's"
Review Text: Had a mc pizza puff, coke and french fries. Taste is consistent, service is quick, big space, prime location, outlet is apt for small party or get together aswell.

Address: Survey 33 /1 /1Poorva Shrushti, Building C, Ground Floor, Wadgoan Khurd, Near Lokmat Bhavan, Nanded City, Sinhgad Road, Pune
Name: "McDonald's"
Review Text:
We visited this branch with kid. she is fond of burger & french fries.
We had burgers & cheese fries.
mirinda float.
Overall avrage experience.

Address: Ground Floor, Lonavala Square, Behind Kumar Resorts
Name: "McDonald's"
Review Text: Lonovala..... ❤️ The most beautiful place to visit.... And this Mc D is located inside the wax museum complex. Ambience is good and it's always crowded.

Address: Phoenix Market City, Nagar Road, Viman Nagar, Pune
Name: "McDonald's"
Review Text:
#DikhaawaEATSOut #39 #McDonalds #PhoenixMarketCity #VimanNagar #Pune

Visiting A Mall And Not Eating At The McDonalds sounds a bore. So we tried to sound cliche. Also to try the discontinued Filet-O-Fish Burger At Chennai Outlets.

Dishes Ordered —
1) Filet-O-Fish Meal ~ This Filet-O-Fish Burger is heaven. The Fish Pattice is just on point and the Fries With Coke Only Complement. Pick Of The EATOut.
2) Veg McPuff ~ Nicely Made Puff with usual Paneer and veggies stuff.
3) McEgg ~ The Pattice is like double cooked Hakf Boil Egg. Another Decent Burger.
4) McAloo Tikki ~ Very Fresh and essence of Aloo Tikki is also there.

Ambience ~ Usual McDonalds Type Set Up.
Worth For The Price ~ Worth it for the quantity.
Location Accessiblity ~ Is Located On Lower Ground Of Mall.
Service ~ Self Service.
Hygiene ~ Yes,it’s hygiene.
Washroom ~ Washroom is Of mall.

Overall -
I just went for The Filet-O-Fish Because I Love That.

Address: Ground Floor, BPCL Petrol Pump, Shivapur, Pune
Name: "McDonald's"
Review Text:
It's very awesome place..👍👍
And the as usual the staff is very friendly. 🤝🤝
Also the AMBIENCE is awesome. 🎉🎉
No need to describe there food...all are testy 🤤❤️

Address: East Block, Amanora Town Centre, Hadapsar Kharadi Bypass, Hadapsar, Pune
Name: "McDonald's"
Review Text: eating burger from mcd is like a common think but what i feel is , maintaining the same taste for so long actually requires efforts..... having there burger from so long but always find the best in it

Address: Urse Toll Naka, Near Bharat Petrol Pump, Mumbai-Pune Expressway, Talegaon Dabhade, Pune, Expressway, Pune
Name: "McDonald's"
Review Text: It is bang on the expressway. One amongst the many food joints In the food plaza. The decor is excellent! Highly maintained. Seemed popular with foreigners. staff efficient and did the burgers here tasted better than anywhere else!
